title: DIY highlighter recipe for an effortless glow
text: Highlighters are trending and how! Everybody wants to get a piece of that desirable glow, and we aren’t complaining! Makeup highlighters are all the rage these days, and rightfully so, they highlight your features and an ethereal glow like no other product in the market. They also happen to be an extremely versatile product. Therefore, it goes without saying, you need this product in your kit ASAP. If you don’t already own a highlighter and are skeptical about its performance or you have never tried it before and find them too expensive for a first time buy, we’ve got news for you. You can create your own makeup highlighter with just three ingredients at home. All you got to do is follow this simple DIY highlighter recipe.
description: Jump on the glow wagon and indulge in a natural makeup highlighter that can be created at home with the help of this DIY recipe
